effect.name: w3fdif Deinterlacer
effect.description: Deinterlace the input video "w3fdif" stands for Weston 3 Field Deinterlacing Filter
effect.author: libavfilter

parameter.name: av.deint
parameter.paramlistdisplay: Deinterlace all frames,Marked as interlaced only
parameter.name: Frames to deinterlace
